summary: Background-image CSS utilities were added and the Home page hero was updated to use a generated asset with an overlay. The diff summary also claims Hotels and Sales Store pages received subtle background accents. However, the required static image assets under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` are not present in the diff (no added files). Several unrelated business/auth/currency/query features were also modified/added, which were explicitly out of scope.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the 3 user-uploaded images as static frontend assets and create optimized background variants suitable for full-width page backgrounds (desktop + mobile), stored under `frontend/public/assets/generated/`.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows frontend code referencing `/assets/generated/...jpg`, but the diff reports no added files, so the actual image assets are not added/committed under `frontend/public/assets/generated/`.

hallucinated_features.description: Changed currency formatting to Indian Rupees (INR) with en-IN digit grouping.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-26/27/28 and outside the background-image scope; also falls under non-goal of not changing business logic-related formatting.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt ("frontend/src/utils/format.ts": currency now configured to format as INR with en-IN locale)

hallucinated_features.description: Header navigation changes (branding, new Home/Order History buttons, admin access, mobile Sheet menu updates).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; unrelated UI/navigation changes beyond applying page background images.

hallucinated_features.description: Authentication modal changes including a non-functional Google/Gmail option with informational message.
hallucinated_features.reason: Explicitly out of scope (non-goals mention no auth/module expansions; request is about background images only).
